content: How/where would 'patient not to be given medication XYZ' be represented in FHIR?
How would 'hospital doctor recommends that GP prescribes drug ABC' be represented in FHIR? (e.g. as part of discharge summary)

ooh - that's a question outside of CF! You might want to ask in a general chat, but depends on the reason why. If an Allergy then there's an allergy intolerance resource - otherwise there's the Flag resource

wrt the discharge summary, then that would be in a document - I suspect the CarePlan would be the best way to give the recommendation (assuming that the hospital doc did not start it) as that will allow a lot of other data about the recommended to be represented...
